content.prompt: The subject matter of the painting includes all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: an event from the artist's own times

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
